articles.author: Ben Morse
articles.title: Republic of Ireland abandons ‘overly physical’ pre-Women’s World Cup friendly with Colombia after 20 minutes
articles.description: A pre-World Cup friendly between Ireland and Colombia on Thursday was abandoned after just 20 minutes after it was deemed “overly physical” by the Football Association of Ireland (FAI).
articles.content:
A pre-Womens World Cup friendly between the Republic of Ireland and Colombia was abandoned after it was deemed overly physical, the Football Association of Ireland (FAI) said in a statement.

articles.title: Putin could face arrest if he attends BRICS summit in South Africa - CNN Video
articles.description: The International Criminal Court's chief prosecutor, Karim Khan, tells CNN that South Africa should "do the right thing" and follow international law if Vladimir Putin attends next month's BRICS summit in Johannesburg. In March, the ICC issued an arrest warra…

articles.author: Maggie Wong
articles.title: Mushroom diplomacy: US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen sets off culinary craze in China
articles.description: During her recent Beijing visit, US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen gave a Yunnan restaurant chain a huge boost while bringing a fascinating variety of mushroom into the national limelight.
articles.content:
Its been several days since US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen left Beijing, and much has been said about her efforts to repair the US-China relationship.
But politics aside, her Beijing visit resul… [+10018 chars]

articles.title: Bodycam video shows officer punch mother holding three-week-old infant  - CNN Video
articles.description: The Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department released body camera footage that shows a deputy punching a mother holding her three-week-old infant during a traffic stop from last July. Sheriff Robert Luna said the punch was "unacceptable."

articles.title: Video: Italian judge acquits man accused of groping teen because it lasted less than 10 seconds | CNN
articles.description: A court ruling that found a school janitor not guilty of groping a student because the act only lasted less than 10 seconds has sparked outrage in Italy. CNN contributor Barbie Latza Nadeau has the story.
